tit.cmt: 名前が間違っています。

sen.j: 石川 盛義（いしかわ もりよし、生年不詳 - 文保2年8月2日 (旧暦)（1318年8月28日））は、鎌倉時代の武将。
sen.e: Motomori ISHIKAWA (year of birth unknown - July 5, 1307) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Kamakura period.
Moriyoshi ISHIKAWA (year of birth unknown - August 28, 1318) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 名前が間違っています。没年が間違っています。(内容が石川元盛のものです。)
sen.e: Moriyoshi ISHIKAWA (year of birth unknown - August 28, 1318) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Kamakura period.

sen.j: 大和源氏の流れを汲む陸奥石川氏11代目当主。
sen.e: The eleventh family head of the Mutsu Ishikawa clan which follows Yamato-Genji (Minamoto clan).
He was the 11th family head of the Mutsu Ishikawa clan, which followed Yamato-Genji (Minamoto clan).
sen.cmt: 主語を加えました。10以上なのでアラビア数字表記です。過去なのでfollowsからfollowedへ修正しました。Whichの前に「、」を加えました。
sen.e: He was the 11th family head of the Mutsu Ishikawa clan, which followed Yamato-Genji (Minamoto clan).
He was the first son of Kanzaburo NAKAMURA the sixth.
He was the first son of Motomori ISHIKAWA.
sen.cmt: 石川元盛がKanzaburo NAKAMURA the sixthとなっています。Motomori ISHIKAWAの間違いです。
sen.e: He was the first son of Motomori ISHIKAWA.

sen.j: 石川家光、家隆、石川時光、義尊、光行らの父。
sen.e: He was the father of Iemitsu ISHIKAWA, Karyu, Kokumitsu ISHIKAWA, Yoshitaka and others.
He was the father of Iemitsu ISHIKAWA, Karyu ISHIKAWA, Tokimitsu ISHIKAWA, Yoshitaka ISHIKAWA and Mitsuyuki ISHIKAWA.
sen.cmt: 全員の人名が入っていません。石川時光がKokumitsu ISHIKAWAとなっています。Tokimitsuの間違いです。
sen.e: He was the father of Iemitsu ISHIKAWA, Karyu ISHIKAWA, Tokimitsu ISHIKAWA, Yoshitaka ISHIKAWA and Mitsuyuki ISHIKAWA.

sen.j: 従五位下信濃守、従四位下安芸守。
sen.e: Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Shinano no kami (governor of Shinano Province), Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Aki no kami (governor of Aki Province)
He filled posts of Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Shinano no kami (governor of Shinano Province) and Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Aki no kami (governor of Aki Province).
He filled posts of Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Shinano no kami (governor of Shinano Province) and Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Aki no kami (governor of Aki Province).
His wife was a daughter of Tsunetoki HOJO.
His wife was a daughter of Tsunetoki HOJO.
His wife was a daughter of Tsunetoki HOJO.

sen.j: 正和3年（1314年）10月、次男家隆、一族石川光助を引き連れて鎌倉を訪れ、将軍守邦親王に拝謁。
sen.e: He visited Kamakura with his second son Karyu and a relative Mitsusuke ISHIKAWA and was granted an audience with the shogun Imperial Prince Morikuni in October, 1314.
In October 1314 he visited Kamakura with his second son Karyu and a relative Mitsusuke ISHIKAWA and was granted an audience with the shogun Imperial Prince Morikuni.
In October 1314 he visited Kamakura with his second son Karyu and a relative Mitsusuke ISHIKAWA and was granted an audience with the shogun Imperial Prince Morikuni.

sen.j: 上洛して盛義は従四位下大和守、光助は従五位下丹波守に任じられる。
sen.e: Moriyoshi and Mitsusuke went up to Kyoto and were appointed to Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Yamato no kami (the governor of Yamato Province) and Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Tanba no kami, respectively.

Moriyoshi and Mitsusuke went up to Kyoto and were appointed to Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Yamato no kami (the governor of Yamato Province) and Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Tanba no kami, respectively.

Moriyoshi and Mitsusuke went up to Kyoto and were appointed to Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) Yamato no kami (the governor of Yamato Province) and Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Tanba no kami, respectively.
